title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.16 - Charges, responsibility for
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.16 - Charges, responsibility for

State Regulations

Charges for dockage are assessed against watercraft, and
the operator, owner and general agent as well as the watercraft shall be liable
therefor. All charges are payable in New York funds at the office of the
treasurer of the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
